meanings.definition: To move in a circle or orbit.
meanings.sent1: The planets daur around the sun in our solar system.
meanings.sent2: The ballerina will daur gracefully across the stage.
meanings.sent3: The dog loves to daur around the backyard chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: The satellite will daur in space to collect data.
meanings.sent5: The carousel horses daur up and down as the music plays.
